card.name: Akroma's Memorial
card.text: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.

card.name: Ancient Ziggurat
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.

card.name: Body Double
card.text: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.

card.name: Chainer's Edict
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Devil's Play
card.text: Devil's Play deals X damage to any target. Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Enchantress's Presence
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

card.name: Gempalm Incinerator
card.text: Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

card.name: Gempalm Polluter
card.text: Cycling {B}{B} ({B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Polluter, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield.

card.name: Honden of Cleansing Fire
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 2 life for each Shrine you control.

card.name: Honden of Infinite Rage
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Honden of Infinite Rage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Shrines you control.

card.name: Honden of Life's Web
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token for each Shrine you control.

card.name: Honden of Night's Reach
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent discards a card for each Shrine you control.

card.name: Honden of Seeing Winds
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card for each Shrine you control.

card.name: Krosan Tusker
card.text: Cycling {2}{G} ({2}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Krosan Tusker, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. (Do this before you draw.)

card.name: Maze's End
card.text: Maze's End enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {3}, {T}, Return Maze's End to its owner's hand: Search your library for a Gate card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. If you control ten or more Gates with different names, you win the game.

card.name: Mirari's Wake
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

card.name: Momentary Blink
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Phyrexian Obliterator
card.text: Trample Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.

card.name: Ratchet Bomb
card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Ratchet Bomb. {T}, Sacrifice Ratchet Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Ratchet Bomb.

card.name: Roar of the Wurm
card.text: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Silent Departure
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Swan Song
card.text: Counter target enchantment, instant, or sorcery spell. Its controller creates a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying.

card.name: Tectonic Reformation
card.text: Each land card in your hand has cycling {R}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Tempered Steel
card.text: Artifact creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Timely Reinforcements
card.text: If you have less life than an opponent, you gain 6 life. If you control fewer creatures than an opponent, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger
card.text: When you cast this spell, exile two target permanents. Indestructible Whenever Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger attacks, defending player exiles the top twenty cards of their library.

card.name: Unburial Rites
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
